The U.S. and other nations have been generous in times like this, and I think we will see both international aid and private charitable help, and God will bless such efforts. May God be with the people of Tonga and the decision-making of their leaders.
In American Samoa, and neighboring Samoa, we have deep memories of the 2009 tsunami, and our hearts go out to Tonga as they help neighbors, assess the damage and begin recovery efforts...

The people of the Kingdom of Tonga are in our thoughts and most importantly in our prayers during this sad time. I think especially of families who haven’t heard from loved ones yet because of the limited communications following the devastating tsunami and volcanic ash...
https://t.co/hcMuqJVVdn

I was deeply saddened to hear of the tragic loss of four precious lives, and other injuries from the heartbreaking vehicle crash over the weekend. My prayers and thoughts are with their families as they mourn.

Our amendment takes another step in standing with our allies in the Marshall Islands. I appreciate working with Congresswoman Katie Porter on this priority for their health and preventing ocean pollution.

Our amendment follows up on a recent Runit Dome study, commissioned in a prior NDAA, to establish what can be declassified. The Runit Dome houses nuclear waste material from 67 nuclear tests conducted in the Marshall Islands before 1958...

Some NDAA specifics for Pacific security: $8.8 billion for the Pacific Deterrence Initiative, expresses U.S. commitment to a free/open Pacific region, codifies an Assistant Secretary of Defense for Indo-Pacific Security Affairs.
The House-passed NDAA includes a 2.7% pay raise for the military, good news for many of our own from American Samoa serving proudly in our nation’s all-volunteer forces.
Congratulations to American Samoa’s CJPA upon another grant notice they worked for, their third announcement in a few weeks time https://t.co/dngVD26zkR
A small business HUBZone bill I sponsored was passed yesterday as part of an amendment into the much larger NDAA bill... https://t.co/ELUn8b8JIK
So, thank you for your service, and happy 74th birthday to the U.S. Air Force and Air National Guard!

God bless the many men and women in the Air Force and Air National Guard as you establish strategic air dominance wherever and whenever needed. I’ve had the opportunity to be on flights crewed by the Air Force and always notice their professionalism first-hand...

During the war on terror, efforts in Iraq, Afghanistan, the Air Force has had a constant, major role securing the skies for our Service Men and Women going into harm’s way. Our nation’s ongoing investment in aircraft, space and cyber technology, is as important as ever...

Congratulations to the United States Air Force, and the Air National Guard upon 74 years as a Service! The U.S. Air Force has a tremendous history. Our nation’s friends and allies rely on the Air Force’s extensive capabilities to keep peace and stability around the globe...

Justice Ginsburg deserves to be highly honored for serving an exceptional 27 years on the Supreme Court. Our prayers go out on behalf of her loved ones and millions of Americans who treasured her as an icon...
Justice Ginsburg was committed to her convictions, yet she was dear friends with Justices who had different strong viewpoints. That can be an enduring example to us...
Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg lived a wonderful American life story. Her career and her strength in adversity became an inspiration, especially to so many women and girls...
